verbs.description: [ARG0: LeBron James] [V: said] " [ARG1: you just laugh to stop from crying " in response to the decline of the tradition of team visits to the White House under Donald Trump] .

LeBron James said " [ARG0: you] [ARGM-ADV: just] [V: laugh] [ARGM-PRP: to stop from crying] " [ARGM-CAU: in response to the decline of the tradition of team visits to the White House under Donald Trump] .
LeBron James said " [ARG0: you] just laugh to [V: stop] [ARGM-CAU: from crying] " in response to the decline of the tradition of team visits to the White House under Donald Trump .
LeBron James said " you just laugh to stop from [V: crying] " in response to the decline of the tradition of team visits to the White House under Donald Trump .
